mapper.sql: select id, createdate, modifydate, patientcode, print_time, print_count from md_inspect_report
mapper.select: SELECT pei.examitem_nameprn, pei.examitemvaluesreport, pei.refrange, pei.units, pei.lisybbh FROM md_peispatientexamitem pei INNER JOIN md_items i ON i.id = pei.id_examfeeitem INNER JOIN md_inspect_charge c ON c.charge_id = i.id AND c.inspect_id = pei.id_examitem AND c.is_delete = 0 INNER JOIN md_basexamltem e ON e.id = pei.id_examitem LEFT JOIN md_yblx yb ON yb.id = i.id_labtype WHERE pei.patientcode = #{patientcode} ORDER BY e.disporder DESC

SELECT pei.examitem_nameprn, pei.examitemvaluesreport, pei.refrange, pei.units, pei.lisybbh, pei.audit_date, pei.receive_date, pei.audit_name, pei.inspect_name, e.examitem_nameeng, pei.status FROM md_peispatientexamitem pei INNER JOIN md_items i ON i.id = pei.id_examfeeitem INNER JOIN md_inspect_charge c ON c.charge_id = i.id AND c.inspect_id = pei.id_examitem AND c.is_delete = 0 INNER JOIN md_basexamltem e ON e.id = pei.id_examitem LEFT JOIN md_yblx yb ON yb.id = i.id_labtype WHERE pei.patientcode = #{patientcode} ORDER BY e.disporder DESC
